scripts.clean: rimraf allure-report allure-results && mkdirp allure-report allure-results
scripts.test: npm install && npm run clean && npm run execute
scripts.execute: npx playwright test tests --project=chromium || npm run posttest
scripts.executechrome: npx playwright test tests --project=chromium || npm run posttest
scripts.testchrome: npm run pretest && npm run executechrome && npm run posttest
scripts.all: npm install && npm run clean && npm run execute && npm run generate && npx allure open allure-report
